Desc.entry: Committed to creating an atmosphere of worship where every individual has a sense of belonging no matter their background, nationality or race. A non-denominational Christian church aiming to advance the Kingdom of God and minister to both the physical and spiritual needs of people in need in the community and provide comfort to the bereaved. Has a commitment towards social reformation and transformation in our communities.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Sunday Service 1-4pm, Mon 7-9pm (prayer and teaching service), Tues 7-8pm (prayer team), 3rd Fri in the month 10pm-2am (all night service), occasional Saturdays 12noon-4pm (quarterly retreats)
